data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Throw-in for Monterrey in their own half.
In the minute 2, Free kick for Monterrey in the half of Leon.
Maximiliano Meza of Monterrey gets in a strike, but is off target.
Leon have a goal kick.
In the minute 3, Monterrey have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
Can Monterrey capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Leon's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 4, Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
Corner awarded to Leon.
Fernando Guerrero signals a Monterrey throw-in in Leon's half.
In the minute 7, Leon to take a throw-in in Monterrey territory.
Free kick for Leon in their own half.
Monterrey awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 9, Can Monterrey get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leon's half?
Monterrey's Miguel Layun misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Leon at Estadio Leon.
In the minute 11, Leon have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball safe as Monterrey is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Leon.
In the minute 12, Ball goes out of play for a Monterrey goal kick.
Free kick for Monterrey in their own half.
Throw-in for Leon in the half of Monterrey.
In the minute 14, Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
Matias Kranevitter (Monterrey) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Fernando Guerrero awards Monterrey a goal kick.
In the minute 16, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Fernando Guerrero signals a Monterrey throw-in in Leon's half.
Monterrey to take a throw-in in Leon territory.
In the minute 17, It's a goal kick for the home team in Leon.
Leon are pushing forward but Emanuel Gigliotti's finish is wide of the goal.
Corner awarded to Leon.
In the minute 19, Monterrey have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
Monterrey have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 21, William Tesillo for Leon has been booked by Fernando Guerrero and receives a first yellow card.
Monterrey are coming forward and Miguel Layun gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Leon at Estadio Leon.
In the minute 25, In Leon Monterrey attack through Carlos Rodriguez. The finish is off target, however.
Fernando Guerrero awards Leon a goal kick.
Monterrey have a goal kick.
In the minute 28, Throw-in Leon.
Throw-in for Monterrey at Estadio Leon.
Monterrey push forward at Estadio Leon and Rogelio Funes Mori gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Leon defence.
In the minute 30, Corner awarded to Monterrey.
Monterrey's Nicolas Sanchez attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Leon goal kick.
In the minute 30, Leon needs to be cautious. Monterrey have an attacking throw-in.
Carlos Rodriguez of Monterrey gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Leon.
In the minute 31, Can Monterrey get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leon's half?
In Leon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Monterrey in their own half.
In the minute 35, Leon are pushing forward but Jean Meneses's finish is wide of the goal.
Fernando Guerrero awards Monterrey a goal kick.
Monterrey have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
In the minute 37, Free kick for Leon in their own half.
Leon drives forward and Jean Meneses gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Important block from the Monterrey defence as Angel Mena fires in a strike for Leon.
In the minute 41, Throw-in for Leon in the half of Monterrey.
Monterrey awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Leon in the half of Monterrey.
In the minute 42, Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Leon.
Nicolas Sosa (Leon) fires in a shot – and hits the post!
Monterrey awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
The second half has started at Estadio Leon.
Free kick for Monterrey in their own half.
In the minute 47, Monterrey to take a throw-in in Leon territory.
Fernando Guerrero awards the away team a throw-in.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
In the minute 49, Can Leon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Monterrey's half?
Ball safe as Leon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Emanuel Gigliotti (Leon) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 52, Monterrey have a goal kick.
Fernando Guerrero signals a Leon throw-in in Monterrey's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 55, Throw-in high up the field for Monterrey in Leon.
Monterrey awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Monterrey in their own half.
In the minute 60, Leon to take a throw-in in Monterrey territory.
Can Leon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Monterrey's half?
Leon make their first substitution with Joel Campbell replacing Nicolas Sosa.
In the minute 62, Arturo Gonzalez is replacing Matias Kranevitter for Monterrey at Estadio Leon.
Ball goes out of play for a Monterrey goal kick.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Monterrey in their own half.
In the minute 65, Throw-in for Leon in their own half.
The match at Estadio Leon has been interrupted briefly for a check on Celso Ortiz, who is down injured.
Monterrey awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 68, Monterrey’s Celso Ortiz is on his feet again at Estadio Leon.
Stefan Medina of Monterrey is pulled up for offside.
Angel Mena for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 71, It's a goal kick for the home team in Leon.
In Leon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Celso Ortiz (Monterrey) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Jonathan Gonzalez.
In the minute 73, Corner awarded to Monterrey.
Free kick for Leon in their own half.
Leon have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
In the minute 76, Goal kick for Monterrey at Estadio Leon.
Antonio Mohamed (Monterrey) is making a third substitution, with Ake Arnaud Loba replacing Maximiliano Meza.
Marcos Ignacio Ambriz is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Leon with Armando Leon replacing Emanuel Gigliotti.
In the minute 80, Jose Rodriguez (Leon) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Leon.
Corner awarded to Leon.
In the minute 83, Luis Montes scores to make it 1-0 at Estadio Leon.
Gil Buron instrumental with a fine assist.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Monterrey in their own half.
In the minute 86, The home team have replaced Angel Mena with Pedro Aquino. This is the third substitution made today by Marcos Ignacio Ambriz.
Free kick for Leon in the half of Monterrey.
Free kick Monterrey.
In the minute 89, Free kick for Leon in the half of Monterrey.
Fernando Guerrero awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Monterrey at Estadio Leon.
Leon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Monterrey drive forward but Ake Arnaud Loba is judged offside.
Leon have a goal kick.
Fernando Guerrero blows to end the match. The final score is 1-0.
Stefan Medina (Monterrey) has received a first yellow card.
